name: Add a new book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
When I add a new book to the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1847491726, title=The Monkey's Raincoat, description=Consequatur aut voluptatem., pageCount=864, excerpt=Corporis dolor ipsam ut. Quia reiciendis sit dignissimos. Dignissimos provident perspiciatis voluptate unde., publishDate=2025-09-21T21:11:55.775056037Z]

steps.name: Then I see a confirmation that the book was added
And the book details include title, description, page count, and publishing date
